```{r setup, include=FALSE}
#### generating plot theme ####
text_size <- 6

theme_leo <- function(base_size = text_size,
                      base_family = "Helvetica") {
                        theme_minimal(
                          base_size = text_size,
                          base_family = base_family
                        ) %+replace%
                        theme(
                          strip.text = element_text(
                            hjust = 0,
                            # face = "italic"
                          ),
                          axis.ticks = element_line(
                            linewidth = 0.125,
                            lineend = "square",
                            color = "black"
                          ),
                          axis.text.x = element_text(
                            size = text_size,
                            colour = "black",
                            margin = margin(1, 1, 1, 1)
                          ),
                          axis.text.y = element_text(
                            colour = "black",
                            size = text_size,
                            angle = 0,
                            vjust = 0.5,
                            hjust = 1,
                            margin = margin(1, 1, 1, 1)
                          ),
                          axis.title = element_text(
                            colour = "black",
                            size = text_size
                          ),
                          panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
                          panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
                          panel.border = element_rect(fill = NA, color = "black", linewidth = 0.25),
                          panel.spacing = unit(1.5, "mm"),
                          legend.position = "none",
                          legend.text = element_text(size = rel(0.8)),
                          legend.key.height = unit(4, "mm"),
                          plot.title = element_text(
                            size = text_size,
                            hjust = 0
                          ),
                          complete = TRUE
                        )
                        }

# convenience figure size functions
```

## 2023-04 Wiesner/AF pilot

```{r}
## Load AF
af_data <- read_tsv("/data/2023_zfp2/Silique_imaging/AF/zfp_AF.tsv") |>
           group_by(genotype, replicate) |>
           mutate(relative = value / mean(value[cell_type == "parenchyma"])) |>
           filter(!(cell_type %in% c("parenchyma", "repulum")))

af_plot <- ggplot(af_data,
                  aes(x = genotype,
                      y = value)) +
           geom_violin(
#              aes(fill = genotype),
             fill = pal_ostwald_disc[1],
             draw_quantiles = 0.5,
             # fill = "white",
             colour = "black",
             alpha = 0.75,
             width = 0.5,
             size = 0.2,
             scale = "width"
           ) +
           geom_quasirandom(
             shape = 21,
             fill = "white",
             colour = "black",
             stroke = 0.1,
             alpha = 1,
             size = 1,
             width = 0.2
           ) +
           stat_summary(
             aes(
               group = replicate,
#                fill = genotype
             ),
             fill = "black",
             colour = "white",
             shape = 23,
             stroke = 0.2,
```

## 2023-05 Whole mount funicles

```{r}
fun_data <- read_tsv("/data/2023_zfp2/Silique_imaging/whole_mount/2023-05_PCW-fluo.csv") |>
            mutate(genotype = recode(genotype, "zfp2-2" = "<i>zfp2-2</i>")) |>
            mutate(genotype = ordered(genotype, levels = c("Col-0", "<i>zfp2-2</i>"))) |>
            mutate(cell_type = ordered(cell_type, levels = c("PCW", "Xylem SCW", "Ectopic SCW"))) |>
            group_by(date, genotype, replicate) |>
            mutate(PCW = mean(intensity[cell_type == "PCW"])) |>
            mutate(relative = intensity / PCW)

fun_avg <- fun_data |>
           group_by(date, genotype, replicate, cell_type) |>
           summarise(relative = mean(relative, na.rm = TRUE))

fun_plot <- ggplot(fun_data,
                   aes(x = cell_type,
                       y = relative,
                       fill = genotype)) +
            geom_violin(
              aes(fill = genotype,
                  group = interaction(genotype, cell_type)),
              draw_quantiles = 0.5,
              colour = "white",
#               alpha = 0.75,
#               width = 0.75,
              linewidth = 0.2,
              scale = "width",
              position = position_dodge(width = 0.8)
            ) +
            geom_quasirandom(
              aes(group = genotype),
              shape = 16,
              colour = "white",
              stroke = 0.1,
              alpha = 1,
              size = 0.5,
              width = 0.2,
              dodge.width = 0.8
            ) +
            geom_point(
              data = fun_avg,
              colour = "white",
              shape = 21,
              stroke = 0.4,
              position = position_dodge(width = 0.8)
            ) +
            scale_fill_manual(values = pal_ostwald_disc[c(1,3)]) +
            labs(
              x = "Cell type",
              y = "Relative lignin fluorescence"
            ) +
            theme_leo() +
            theme(axis.title.x = element_blank(),
                  legend.position = c(0.1, 0.85),
                  legend.title = element_blank(),
                  legend.text = element_markdown())

pdf(paste0("/data/2023_zfp2/", "zfp_funicles.pdf"), width = onecol, height = onecol * 0.4)
fun_plot
dev.off()
```

## 2023-11 Funicle eSCW density

```{r}

eSCW <- read_tsv("/home/leonard/Dropbox/2022_zfp2/funiculus_eSCW.tsv") 

eSCW_density <- eSCW |> 
  mutate(min_total = min(total)) |> 
  filter(distance < min_total) |> 
  group_by(genotype, replicate) |> 
  summarise(
    n = n(),
    total = unique(total),
    min_total = unique(min_total)) |> 
  mutate(
    density = (n / min_total) * 2
    )

ggplot(eSCW_density,
       aes(x = genotype,
           y = density)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(
    x = NULL,
    y = "Ectopic SCW formation [cells per Âµm funicle]"
  ) +
  theme_leo() +
  theme(axis.title.y = element_markdown())

```


## 2023-09 Timeline sections

### Repulum area

```{r}

px_per_micron <- 4.3411
Wiesner_areas <- read_tsv("/data/2023_zfp2/Silique_imaging/Wiesner/2023-09_Wiesner/repulum_areas.tsv") |> 
  mutate(
    area = area / (px_per_micron^2),
    total_area = total_area / (px_per_micron^2),
    method = "Wiesner stain")

  mutate(method = "Basic Fuchsin")

  select(-mean) |> 
  pivot_longer(c(area, total_area), names_to = "variable", values_to = "value") |> 
  mutate(variable = case_match(variable,
```

## Glucosinolates

```{r}
gluc_data <- read_tsv("/home/leonard/Dropbox/2022_zfp2/Glucosinolates/chain_length.tsv") |> 
  select(-`Indole GLS`) |> 
  pivot_longer(c(3:4), names_to = "metabolite", values_to = "nmol") |> 
  mutate(Genotype = ordered(
    Genotype, 
    levels = c(
      "Col-0",
      "<i>zfp2-1</i>",
      "<i>zfp2-2</i>",
      "<i>zfp2-3</i>"
    )))

letters <- letter_groups(
  gluc_data,
  nmol,
  Genotype,
  "tukey",
  metabolite,
  Tissuetype,
  print_position = "above",
  print_adjust = 1.5
) |> 
  mutate(nmol = case_when(nmol < 0.6 ~ nmol + 0.3,
                          TRUE ~ nmol))

ggplot(gluc_data,
       aes(x = Genotype,
           y = nmol)) +
  geom_violin(
    adjust = 1.5,
    draw_quantiles = 0.5,
    colour = "black",
    scale = "width"
  ) +
  geom_quasirandom(
    aes(fill = Genotype),
    size = 1.2,
    stroke = 0.2,
    colour = "white",
    shape = 21,
    width = 0.2
  ) +
  geom_text(
    data = letters,
    aes(label = Letters),
    size = ggtext_size,
    family = "Helvetica"
  ) +
  labs(y = "Amount [nmol]") +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0.05, 0.2))) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c(
    pal_ostwald_disc[1], 
    colorspace::lighten(pal_ostwald_disc[3], 0.2), 
    pal_ostwald_disc[3],
    colorspace::darken(pal_ostwald_disc[3], 0.2))) +
  theme_leo() +
  theme(
    axis.text.x = element_markdown(),
    axis.title.x = element_blank()
  ) +
  facet_grid(
    Tissuetype ~ metabolite,
    scales = "free")

ggsave(
  "glucs.pdf",
  width = 110,
  height = 90,
  units = "mm"
)

```
